description_for_human: ค้นหาและดึง Facebook Ad Interests แล้วสรุปเป็นตาราง
description_for_model: Call the Facebook Graph API `search` endpoint with type=adinterest to fetch interests. Always return a cleaned table with key fields. Handle pagination using the `after` cursor until ~500 rows or API limits.

auth.instructions: Paste a long-lived Facebook Graph API access token (Marketing API). It will be sent as an Authorization: Bearer <token> header.
